What to Know About the Motheo TVET College Application Form Portal

The Motheo TVET College Application portal is designed to accept application of candidates seeking for admission into the University. In the portal, applicant can Purchase application form, Track and monitor application status, pay fees, Print Acknowledgement Slip, check admission list, etc.

Who is Eligible to Apply for Admission

To be eligible for admission in the Motheo application portal, candidates must;

  • Have Secondary School Leaving Certificate
  • Meet National Senior Certificate (NSC) requirement for admission into Higher Certificate
  • Grade 12 certificate applicant is of added advantage
  • Must write the NBTs for admission to Motheo on/before 15 October 2024.
  • FPS of 480 or above.
  • NBT scores of Upper
  • Intermediate for AL & QL
  • Mathematics 60%
  • English HL 50%
  • English FAL 60%

How to Apply | Motheo Application Form 2024

Eligible candidates can click here to apply.

Follow the steps below

  • Visit Application portal
  • Choose type of Application (Undergraduate, Post Graduate, Semester Studies)
  • Fill and complete all necessary pages
  • Pay Application fees where required

 

Motheo TVET College Application Required Documents

To apply to Motheo you need to submit the following documentation:

  • A completed application form
  • A copy of your results for the latest school year
  • A copy of your ID
  • If you have attended another higher education institution, we need a copy of your academic transcript

For more information regarding the application for admission into the Motheo TVET College , kindly drop your messages in the comment box below.
